name: Demon Attack Redux
description:
DEMON ATTACK REMAKE

_____________________________________________________________________

Demon Attack x Star Fox

by - AJS

OVERVIEW

Demon attack remake is an adaptation of the Atari game called Demon Attack.

Demon attack remake is a rail shooter and a third person action game where you take control of STAR WOLF.

             

_____________________________________________________________________

GOAL

The goal is to survive as long as possible killing demons and bosses to score the most amount of points.

_____________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS Keyboard and mouse
  • Up - W
  • Down - S
  • Left - A
  • Right - D
  • Action - Space.
Controller
  • Movement - Left stick
  • Action - A button

_____________________________________________________________________

TEAM MEMBERS

Abhay Venugopal - Artist

Jhon Gomez - PM

Sinan Bakkaloglu - Programmer
